Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is a perfect match for your needs and expectations. This product holds significant value for you, just like it does for me, and I am confident it will bring you immense benefits. Considering its exceptional quality and the impact it can have on your life or business, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,500. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive the best possible value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I would be honored if you could accept this proposal and take advantage of this opportunity. If you need any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
